episodes.title: SMNTY Classics: Women Cult Leaders (Part 2)
episodes.description: In our classic wrap-up look at women cult leaders, we examine even more examples of women founding, leading and maintaining cults. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: SMNTY Classics: Women Cult Leaders (Part 1)
episodes.description: While probably not what you think of when conjuring up an image of a cult leader, women have been and are cult leaders and instrumental to propping up and running these organizations. Anney and Samantha discuss the definition of cult, what makes a cult leader, who they target for members and historical women cult leaders in this classic episode. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: Book Club: Cult Girls
episodes.description: The 2022 graphic novel Cult Girls written by Natalie Grand and illustrated by Cassandra Bolan tackled the author's experience with a patriarchal, suppressive religion and breaking free from it. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: Women Cult Leaders: Part 1 | STUFF MOM NEVER TOLD YOU
episodes.description:
🛎  If You're New Subscribe ► https://bit.ly/SMNTYSubscribe

Women Cult Leaders: Part 1 | STUFF MOM NEVER TOLD YOU

While probably not what you think of when conjuring up an image of a cult leader, women have been and are cult leaders and instrumental to propping up and running these organizations. Anney and Samantha discuss the definition of cult, what makes a cult leader, who they target for members and historical women cult leaders.

Original Air Date: May 14, 2021

Stuff Mom Never Told You is a podcast that examines all aspects of today’s society through an intersectional feminist perspective, whether it’s pop culture, the lack of pockets on women’s clothing, or the politics impacting our daily lives. No topic is off-limits. Hosts Anney Reese and Samantha McVey dive into science, history, and culture to better understand the challenges facing women and marginalized folks all over the globe and how to tackle them head-on. Stuff Mom Never Told You gives you the tools to make sense of the every day, unpacking the stories that brought us to where we are, and discussing practical ways we can work together to make things better for everyone. 

New episodes daily on iHeartRadio.
